name: gallery-y-common-dombind
description: Utility to bind dom with javascript and viceversa, helping to avoid events attaching and data updates directly
author: asotog88

examples.name: example-simple-binding
examples.description: This component provides a simple way to bind the dom to model and viceversa without any configuration, only by defining the model properties to be bind inside of the html

examples.name: example-more-binding
examples.description: Multiple elements can be bind to same model property, reflecting the model updates to every element bind

examples.name: example-setting-model-from-code
examples.description: The model also can be updated from the code directly and changes are going to be reflected in the ui
